--- On Tue, 5/25/10, Michael Vinehout <mljvine@...> wrote:

From: Michael Vinehout <mljvine@...>
Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] newbie here

Here is a place to start learning:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiku-ichimonji

Mike



To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
From: julius_lopez82@...
Date: Mon, 24 May 2010 21:01:07 -0700
Subject: [nihontostudy] newbie here

 



Hi to all!

I'm a newbie here in this group. Can I ask what does ICHIMONJI mean?
